topic.title: Webextension for browsers
topic.body:
I've created webextension for browsers to make using zeronet easier.
It will start Zeronet once you visit ZN url.
Here is initial but working version.
Any feedback and comments is appreciated.

https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/zeronet-helper/

1517072402_1Kzonk6v6ccFT3adLkCHoKJhGnoW1.body:
> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_6_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): Do You consider adding it to https://addons.mozilla.org ?What is the list of features?

That's the plan. 
Addon will start Zeronet once you visit ZN url.
Maybe to chrome webstore, but I've just notices they want money for an account. Somebody got a space 5 bucks?

> [jamesholden](#comment_5_12w3zJ6gRrcAw2kSCQXDkorgqxuXnkKkF8): I've (personally) not much real use for it but I find the idea of having a web browser helper really cool, kudos to you for developing it ! I took a look at the code and it looks very sane. [...]

Thanks. 
For the notifications there are webtechnologies that can do that without addons. Looks like zites creators don't use that.
